en: They haven't heard from him in a long time.

en: They have twin daughters.

en: They are free from care.

en: They had no food.

en: They had nothing to eat.

en: They did not have much food to eat.

en: They have not less than ten children.

en: They had no house in which to live.

en: They have but the shadow of freedom.

en: They had only one child.

en: They have no sense of sin.

en: They have something in common with each other.

en: They have no house to live in at all.

en: They hardly have any time left.

en: I haven't seen them anywhere.

en: They have little chance to practice it.

en: They have the right to do so.

en: They had two daughters, who became famous pianists.

en: They have two sons and one daughter.

en: They have a ten-year-old son.

en: They have a lot in common.

en: They have nowhere else to go.

en: It's important for them to go out.

en: Queer rumors about them were in the air.

en: They have seen better days.

en: They scarcely need it at all.

en: Anything you could do in support of their effort would be very much appreciated.

en: He went at them with his fists.

en: Don't associate with them.

en: It's no use bandying words with them.

en: Laugh with them.

en: I am working with them towards world peace.

en: You have to hurry if you want to go with them.

en: I concurred with them in giving him the prize.

en: They talk a lot to one another, over the telephone and in person.

en: I can't fit in with them.

en: It is vain to argue with them about the problem.

en: A party of scientists were on board with them.

en: It will be some time before they come.

en: I shouldn't wonder if they came after all.

en: I hope they don't resort to violence to accomplish their goals.

en: Don't interpret their silence as obedience.

en: They welcomed me warmly, so I felt at home.

en: They may properly claim the protection of the law.

en: They are hugging and kissing.

en: No wonder they have elected him chairman.

en: It is five years since they came to Japan.

en: It's been five years since they came to Japan.

en: The manual they asked him to read was two inches thick.
zh: 他们让他读的那本手册足足有两英寸厚。

en: Ten minutes after they had passed Nara, the car ran out of gas.
zh: 车子过奈良十分钟后就没油了。

en: The precise time of their arrival is not known.
zh: 还不清楚他们具体的到达时间。

en: The precise time of their arrival isn't known.
zh: 没人知道他们到底几点到。

en: I feel in my bones that they will never get along well together.

en: It was my fault that they came late.

en: There are many problems for them to deal with.

en: You know how crazy they are over their little bundle of joy.

en: You must take action for their early release.

en: Were they busy last week?

en: We do not anticipate their buying a new car.

en: They had hardly started when it began to rain.

en: The dinner they served was badly cooked.

en: Have they ever come on time?

en: I spoke slowly so that they might understand me.

en: His story doesn't agree with what they have said to me.

en: The idea they put to us fell in exactly with what we ourselves had in mind.

en: The number of prey they killed was the same.

en: There was some monkey business going on when they were negotiating that last contract; money passed under the table.

en: The research done by them shows that Americans are not interested in Japan.

en: I know they're in love with each other.

en: I know that they're in love with each other.

en: There is little hope that they are alive.

en: He has seen better days.

en: He will also go.

en: I have nothing more to say about him.

en: He is not coming, either.

en: His English will improve in the course of time.

en: He plays it smart!

en: He gets tough at times.

en: He was finally forced to resign.

en: He has finally shown his true colors.

en: He saw it also.

en: He saw it, too.

en: He also saw it.
zh: 他也看见了。

en: It is no wonder that a man of his ability is so successful.

en: No other student in the class is so brilliant as he is.

en: No other student in the class is as brilliant as he is.

en: Nobody is cleverer than he.

en: It is practically unthinkable that a scientist of his stature would have made such an elementary mistake.

en: He is as great a man as ever lived.

en: Get off his back.

en: My love for him has already cooled.

en: We knelt down to pray.

en: He cannot afford the common comforts of life, not to mention luxuries.

en: He denied himself nothing.

en: He lives in luxury.

en: He carried out the plan he had made in detail.

en: He got his dander up.

en: He is a methodical person.

en: He tends to be arrogant.

en: He sat there with his arms folded.

en: He was standing with his arms folded.

en: He has improved in skill.

en: He has powerful arms.

en: He has pains in his side.

en: He has a pain in his side.

en: He didn't stop talking.

en: He did not speak unless spoken to.

en: He is a good speaker.
